title: Timmzzy
author: Timmzzy
content: i think say i don see things finish not on till i come see the way topics just dey get moves, is it that this person no know say here no be were you go come dey mess around like this or na network cause am...abeg make una follow me talk for this one because I no understand even the topics dey TWO TWO

comments.author: Out of mind
comments.body: Maybe something is going wrong in the forum today due to some problem. But when you post be sure to click post and wait some time then back your post will be done. And if you keep refreshing the number of posts will only increase as you already have a few posts.May be this is the problem for everyone, I also encountered this problem while doing a few posts. If you post now, then this 1st click post will be done. If you click on the post again and again, many new posts will be made.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Why is this happening here on Nigeria local board only? Please make sure you check if your topic has been posted already before you click on 'post' again.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: I noticed it as well when I checked but I was extremely cautious because of the forum policies. I did observed the glitch but I had to handle with utmost attention in other not to double post  although I am no more experiencing it. For the deleted post or topic, I think OP was not aware of that because the way it happened, no one could detect such error until it is posted before you could spot the glitch. That was the reason many posts, comments and replies duplicated itself. I also noticed that topic was moved, locked and deleted. Maybe that post is against forum policies because I tried opening it it shows It exceeds my limit or topic no longer exists meaning it has been deleted. Maybe the post was reported or something else must have happened.

comments.author: Timmzzy
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on July 09, 2023, 08:11:45 PMWhy is this happening here on Nigeria local board only? Please make sure you check if your topic has been posted already before you click on 'post' again.Me self no understand weytin really happen yesterday for forum here but i just think that the issue solve, i think this too has messed up people's activities on SIGN campaigns and so on like those who are to make submission in there campaign thread. the method i used yesterday so i dont double post was kind of cool though but stressful.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: I know believe say that issue of duplicate posting na only here wey e happen. The thing be say we suppose know say something dey wrong for forum network then, wey make that thing dey happen because people no dey sure say deir post dey delivered but na commonsense to know how to go about it. The thing na to dey patient and go back to recheck for your message whether you go see am for there, make we dey patient in certain things make we no bring our throat out by ourselves.And incase we see duplicate messages there, na to delete them and leave one instead of leaving everything there. As a full member we should know these things at least. For example self, when you send email, you go fit still check if e don go or not if you are in doubt.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on July 11, 2023, 09:06:42 PMQuote from: Gozie51 on July 11, 2023, 12:45:05 PMI know believe say that issue of duplicate posting na only here wey e happen. The thing be say we suppose know say something dey wrong for forum network then, wey make that thing dey happen because people no dey sure say deir post dey delivered but na commonsense to know how to go about it. I checked many other boards, there were no problem. I saw the duplicate posting just on our local board. Did you check any other board at all to confirm if you are right that it happened on some other boards? Never mind my posts, I only thought it is needed because you went against what I posted that 'why is it happening on only Nigeria board'. And yes, the forum got issue which has been the reason. I think everything is working fine now.This also made me to check neighbour boards and I see dat na only our board nai get that issue. And I also noticed one thing be sae, our board e dey active pass almost all di boards I checked. Dat day why do thing happened well well for our board more be sae, people dey post and di website go come dey verify cloudflare and upon dat verification process im now e don submit and u, u know know come dey submit am again di same thing again so the post now come dey duplicate. E happen to me a brother pm to delete am and did sharply.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on July 11, 2023, 09:06:42 PMQuote from: Gozie51 on July 11, 2023, 12:45:05 PMI know believe say that issue of duplicate posting na only here wey e happen. The thing be say we suppose know say something dey wrong for forum network then, wey make that thing dey happen because people no dey sure say deir post dey delivered but na commonsense to know how to go about it. I checked many other boards, there were no problem. I saw the duplicate posting just on our local board. Did you check any other board at all to confirm if you are right that it happened on some other boards? The forum have been having network challenge for the past 3 days now, and I think that's what might have resulted to that duplicate posting, as the O.P of those thread may have think his thread hasn't been published, and kept on trying again & again, not knowing actually it's been published, because it happened to me within that period & I'm sure lots of persons experience that same issue. So what I think the O.P of those thread should have done is report it to be deleted and not moved to a different board, as it wasn't intentional but a mistake that happen most times, because if you could check the time difference between that thread, you will notice it's not much.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: Timmzzy on July 09, 2023, 07:37:08 PMis it that this person no know say here no be were you go come dey mess around like this or na network cause am...abeg make una follow me talk for this one because I no understand even the topics dey TWO TWO   The forum was generally having issue because even some of my reply to posts were duplicated yesterday and I had to delete some later when I found out about it. But what baffles me the most of this topics that are being moved is that; the posts are from one person and he has created two different topic at that same time and repeatedly posted them. Could it be the problem he was encountering was different from the one others were facing? Although everything has been moving perfectly again.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Asiska02 on July 12, 2023, 09:12:26 PMThe forum was generally having issue because even some of my reply to posts were duplicated yesterday and I had to delete some later when I found out about it. But what baffles me the most of this topics that are being moved is that; the posts are from one person and he has created two different topic at that same time and repeatedly posted them. Could it be the problem he was encountering was different from the one others were facing? Although everything has been moving perfectly again.It was the same problem, but he kept repeating it. I mean he did not know the posts are submitted successfully already but keep pressing on 'post', thinking that it did not submit. The main issue is that he moved the topic to archival. If the topics were not moved to archival, all would have been deleted. Even this thread's topic was created like four times too, but it was easy to report it and deleted, making it to remain just one. I do not think a moderator moved the topics, but likely the the OP.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Something like dis can only come from newbies because, even though d message is send dem no go no than continue sending until dey begin to see pretty topics for only one particular topic. OP, once you send topic and e b u like d topic no go just go back and check your past post to no if d topic is delivered or not.

comments.author: manin89326
comments.body: Unique Service Off page SEO backlinks for help your Website
